vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.10.2;
son of: Japheth (H3315);
brother of: Gomer (H1586), Magog (H4031), Madai (H4074), Javan (H3120), Tubal (H8422) and Meshech (H4902)
§ Tiras = "desire"
son of Japheth and grandson of Noah
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
提拉 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "渴望"
雅弗的兒子, 挪亞的孫子
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
提拉 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "渴望"
雅弗的儿子, 挪亚的孙子
